name: Demon Hunter (itch) (Scipioceaser)
description:
Demon Hunter is a short First Person Shooter demo, made in about three days for the GBJAM 8.

You are a Demon Hunter, you hunt demons, and you can only move by firing your weapon. Good hunting.

You move with the arrows, you fire with A, you change your weapon with S, you try again with R and you evade your doom with Escape.
